name: 賴建宏
objective:
本課程將從基礎深度學習理論、邊緣智慧硬體應用、資料集建置、客製化模型訓練到推論環境佈署，讓學員透過 Google Colab, Intel OpenVINO, OpenCV 等開源工具，學習如何規畫及實踐不同類型的低功耗、低延時、低成本及高隱私的邊緣智慧應用專案。
This course will cover basic deep learning theory, edge smart hardware application, data set construction, customized model training, and inference environment deployment. Allowing students to learn how to plan and practice types of edge smart application with low power consumption, low latency, low cost, and high privacy features.
schedule:
AI Trends - Notebooks
Table of Contents
  Installation Guide
  Getting Started
  First steps
  Convert & Optimize
  Model Demos
  Model Training
  Live Demos
  System Requirements
  Run the Notebooks
  Launch a Single Notebook
  Launch all Notebooks
  Cleaning Up
  Troubleshooting
scorePolicy:
Midterm 30%
Final presentation 30%
平時成績 40%
materials:
採用 Intel OpenVINO 2023 開放的 GitHub 文件與案例
https://github.com/openvinotoolkit/openvino_notebooks
